item.title: MainStreet Bancshares Inc 10-K
item.description: MainStreet Bancshares Inc, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 23, 2022 had 36848 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: bank - 405 instances financial - 398 instances company - 389 instances interest - 384 instances 31 - 380 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
